mapper.update: update lottery_people set serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_num = #{identityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, family_type = #{familyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, has_other_people = #{hasOtherPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lottery_rank = #{lotteryRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_num = #{recordNum,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where people_id = #{peopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select people_id, serial_num, house_id, `name`, identity_num, family_type, has_other_people, lottery_rank, record_num from lottery_people where people_id = #{peopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select people_id, serial_num, house_id, `name`, identity_num, family_type, has_other_people, lottery_rank, record_num from lottery_people
mapper.delete: delete b from lottery_people b left join lottery_house c on b.house_id = c.house_id where c.house_id =#{houseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
